summary: A charming scoundrel reflects on his exploits, from childhood through to manhood.
cast: Sacha Guitry|Adolphe Borchard|Marcel Lucien|Raymond Clunie|Paul Duvergé|Guerbe|Henri Ménessier|Mailleray|Marguerite Moreno|Jacqueline Delubac|Roger Duchesne|Rosine Deréan|Elmire Vautier|Serge Grave|Fréhel|Pierre Labry|Pauline Carton|Pierre Assy|Henri Peiffert|Myriam Borsoutsky|Gaston Dupray|Serge Sandberg|Georges Derveaux|Miguel Primo de Rivera|Fernand Trignol
title: Le roman d'un tricheur
